comments.text: Ive found for my 57yo hair that brush dryers dont work on me because the air direction is not with the grain on hair cuticle. It makes my hair more frizzy even with proper products. My hair is smooth when i direct traditional hairdryer with the "grain" of hair shaft
comments.author: @midlifemom5829

comments.text: I follow all the tips but still have a lot of frizz. I have wavy, fine hair and use the brush attachment on my airstyler. Are hot air brushes perhaps simply unsuitable for fine hair? Maybe i should use a normal blow dryer with a nozzle?
